name: Bertie's Animal Kingdom
overview: Bertie's Animal Kingdom is an Animal recognition game designed for nursery and pre-school children. The only requirement is that the child must have a basic knowledge of how to use a mouse Keyboard controls are not required except to enter the child's name for the hi-score table. All actions which the child does highlight different areas of the screen in a bright color so that they know what they are doing if they click the mouse button on that spot.
